title: sadguru naathha
sahitya:
sadguru nAthA manam irangAdA mAl marugA

singAra vEl murugA

anupallavi

siddhar munivar tozhum siva guravE undan

bhaktar manam magizhum tiruvuruvE endan

caraNam

ambikaiyin pudalvan tenpazhanik kadipan

inbattamizh isaiyin inimaiyin sAramivan

anbar tamakkaruLum amarargaLin talaivan

anbE kaDavuL enRuNarttum muzhumudalvan
